Hi. Are you right-wing? 

Do you believe that people should be judged by the content of their character over the color of their skin?

Do you believe that we shouldn't take into account race, religion, or nationality when determining who are good people or not?

Do you denounce racists, Anti-semites, white nationalists and neo-Nazis while also largely supporting the "white-nationalist, neo-nazi, racist, anti-semetic" Donald J. Trump and GOP?

Then this is the guild for you.

data.description:
The two main objectives of this Guild:

* Gather evidence on any topic for anyone to visit the Guild and view.

* Act as a debate tool. Make a post and compartmentalize your arguments in it to avoid repeating yourself in debates.

Who says debating has to be a headache?

Rules:

1. You must compile your argument in a post, not a comment. This allows for an easy permanent link that you can keep coming back to and linking to, and reduces messy comment clutter.

2. Posts must be appropriately titled. Think "If I were trying to find evidence on this topic that I'm about to make a post on, what would I search for?" and title your post according to that. 
E.g: "Evidence for Police Brutality" or "Police Brutality Statistics".
data.description_html:
The two main objectives of this Guild:

  • Gather evidence on any topic for anyone to visit the Guild and view.

  • Act as a debate tool. Make a post and compartmentalize your arguments in it to avoid repeating yourself in debates.

Who says debating has to be a headache?

Rules:

  1. You must compile your argument in a post, not a comment. This allows for an easy permanent link that you can keep coming back to and linking to, and reduces messy comment clutter.

  2. Posts must be appropriately titled. Think "If I were trying to find evidence on this topic that I'm about to make a post on, what would I search for?" and title your post according to that. E.g: "Evidence for Police Brutality" or "Police Brutality Statistics".
data.name: EvidenceGathering

data.description:
+FOSSCAD is a guild dedicated to the discussion of 3D printed guns and related topics.

Rules:

1. Keep posts on topic and high quality.
2. Be civil and don't troll.
3. Do not encourage, glorify, incite, or call for violence or physical harm against an individual or a group of people.
4. To combat spam, accounts must be at least 7 days old to post and comment.
5. Always research your country, state, and local laws before printing or downloading 3D files.
6. ~~Do not share "3D printing files to produce firearms" per Reddit's content policy.~~ **Shall not be infringed.** Freedom of Speech welcomed, links encouraged.

Right now, the r/FOSSCAD subreddit has the best Wiki and FAQ, so if you are curious, visit [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/fosscad/wiki/index)
data.description_html:
+FOSSCAD is a guild dedicated to the discussion of 3D printed guns and related topics.

Rules:

  1. Keep posts on topic and high quality.
  2. Be civil and don't troll.
  3. Do not encourage, glorify, incite, or call for violence or physical harm against an individual or a group of people.
  4. To combat spam, accounts must be at least 7 days old to post and comment.
  5. Always research your country, state, and local laws before printing or downloading 3D files.
  6. Do not share "3D printing files to produce firearms" per Reddit's content policy. Shall not be infringed. Freedom of Speech welcomed, links encouraged.

Right now, the r/FOSSCAD subreddit has the best Wiki and FAQ, so if you are curious, visit here
data.name: FOSSCAD

data.description: The Third Position is revolutionary nationalism rooted in an organic worldview. It is built on social capital and is a grassroots populist struggle of the people against the forces of International Finance (the ruling elite) and the spiritual decadence of Materialism (the ideologies of Liberalism and Marxism). This guild is a place for the discussion of third position politics.
